story:
Once upon a time, in a lush green forest, there lived a curious little bunny named Cotton. Cotton was as white as freshly fallen snow, and she loved to hop and play among the wildflowers under the warm sun.

One day, as Cotton was exploring the forest, she came across a magical stream shimmering with rainbow colors. The stream was guarded by a wise old owl, who greeted Cotton with a twinkle in his eyes.

"Hello, little bunny," the owl hooted gently. "I am the guardian of this magical stream. It is said that whoever drinks from its waters will have their wishes come true."

Cotton's eyes widened with wonder as she approached the stream. She took a sip of the sparkling water and closed her eyes, making a wish with all her heart. She wished for all the animals in the forest to live in harmony and peace, and for her family to always be safe and happy.

As she opened her eyes, she saw a brilliant light shining brightly around her. The forest was filled with a sense of peace and tranquility, and all the animals gathered around Cotton, thanking her for her selfless wish.

From that day on, Cotton was known as the Bringer of Peace in the forest. Her kindness and compassion touched the hearts of all who met her, and the magical stream continued to bring happiness and harmony to all who drank from its waters.

And so, every night as Cotton nestled in her cozy burrow under the stars, she knew that she had made a difference in the world by spreading love and kindness wherever she went.

And with that, she closed her eyes and drifted off to sleep, dreaming of new adventures and friendships yet to come.

Goodnight, dear child. Dream sweet dreams, just like Cotton, the Bringer of Peace.
